Show HN: I made a free Prompt Optimizer extension for perfect prompts instantly
articles.description:
Every prompt optimizer extension uses a freemium model and provides very limited free quota. That was very frustating so I built my own extension. It uses the Google API key, which offers a generous free tier that's more than enough for personal use (50 to 1000 RPD depending on the model), and it's available for everyone.
